title: BerlinskiBeat 2013 Discography
description:
"Discography" is a bit grandiloquent, since so far they have released only two discs
  - #1 Limited (EP)
  - Gassehauer
but here they are, since I couldn't find them anywhere. Enjoy :)

--------

BerlinskiBeat: This is Wim, Castus, Norri, Vit, Steve, Pan, and Hatz. Together, they deliver extremely danceable BerlinskiBeat sound. Also on board: Robert Soko, the godfather of the Balkan beats scene, acting as the beatconsultant of BerlinskiBeat.

A Polish bagpipe player, a German tuba player, a Czech trumpet player, a singer from the bloodline of a genuine gypsy king, a DJ from Bosnia, East and West Berlin drummers and percussionists - an explosive mix of street music, club sounds and Berlin snout tells stories about the smell of the city, wild nights, the ladies of Berlin, retired belly dancers and makes you Ã¢â‚¬Å“move ya assÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

--------

The most recent spin-off of Corvus Corvax, mixing Pop, Berlin electro, Ska, Swing and of course, Bagpipes and drums.

Their website is at http://www.berlinskibeat.com If you like this, support them, and go and see them live. I promise it is worth it.
